import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import clsx from 'clsx'; import Navigation from './Navigation' const App = () => { const classes = useStyles(); const [page, setPage] = useState("Home") const [drawerOpen, setDrawerOpen] = React.useState(true); const handleDrawerOpen = () => { setDrawerOpen(true); }; const handleDrawerClose = () => { setDrawerOpen(false); }; return ( <> R2D2
setPage("create")}> setPage("initial")}> setPage("dashboard")}> setPage("archive")}> setPage("profile")}> setPage("admin")}>
) }; export default App;
